programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: It's Okay To Not Be Okay
programme.desc: This series follows the story of an author with severe antisocial tendencies who learns to confront her deep emotional wounds when she meets a stranger who challenges her cold facade.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Sins Of The Father
programme.desc: This crime thriller mystery drama sheds light on the plight of scam victims, and is centred around a man named Samuel, whose life is shattered by a scam involving his father.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: It's Okay To Not Be Okay
It's Okay To Not Be Okay
Love Between Fairy and Moon Supreme
Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 27
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 28
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 37
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 117
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 22
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 5
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 1
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 118
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 38
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 5
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 38
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 118
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 12
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 1
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 38
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 5
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 6
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 29
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 30
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 39

Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 5
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 22
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 6
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 11
programme.desc:
‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Masamang Damo
programme.desc: When Joko Diaz placed his family in danger after getting into an imbroglio with fellow slumboys, he wisely contrived a plan.

programme.title: Teacher... Teacher, I Love You
programme.desc: Raul Portugis is a Physics professor from Cebu who had relocated to Manila and became a witness to a crime. This, plus the experience of handling a difficult class and being a newcomer in the big city, results in one of Redford White's funniest films.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Balweg
programme.desc: In the war which ensued with the arrival of the military forces, Fr. Balweg was forced out of his parish and into the mountains, where he later became one of the most charismatic of leaders, admired by the masses, hated by the government and loved by many women.

programme.title: Magkapalad
programme.desc: In a world dictated by greed and lawlessness, two hearts find each other and fall in love.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Palimos Ng Pag-Ibig (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Outside,It looks like a marriage made in heaven.But inside the thick walls of what they call home,theirs is a relationship waiting to crumble.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Alex Boncayao Brigade
programme.desc: New People's Army comrade Ka Romy (Ronnie Ricketts) is assigned by higher command to form an elite hit team to operate in the city. Their group is called the Alex Boncayao Brigade. Meanwhile, the military also mounts an operation to capture the brigade. When will both sides realize that in war, there can be no winners and losers.

programme.title: Pikoy Goes To Malaysia
programme.desc: Tribal customs commands Pikoy to get married. But the union is against his will. He neglects his bride and humiliates his family. As punishment, he is banished from the tribe and forbidden to speak until he is ready to submit himself to the rules.

programme.title: Kung Kailangan Mo Ako
programme.desc: The cranky and ill-natured Sharon Cuneta was the vital witness in a celebrated case and the guilty parties would do anything to put her away. While she had been trying to flee from her pursuers in a cab driven by Rudy Fernandez, they got into an accident, which made her lose her memory.

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: The Flor Contemplacion Story (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The tragic tale of the Filipino maid hanged for the murder in Singapore in 1995 not only called the attention to the plight of overseas workers everywhere in the world but also resulted in one of the most acclaimed films in Philippine motion picture history.

programme.title: Akyat Bahay Gang
programme.desc: Lito Lapid was working in a carnival. He learned to do many things to meet both ends. He was a good man but circumstances tried to direct him on the wrong path.

programme.title: The Secret of Katrina Salazar
programme.desc: Her name is Katrina Salazar, a beautiful woman admired by men but sincerely loved by just one. But behind the lovely face and the pleasant countenance is a dark secret no one knows: she is a nymphomaniac.

programme.title: Kapitan Tumba
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: D' Godson
programme.desc: A parody of the film The Godfather (1972). A young boy (Niño Muhlach) wants to follow the footsteps of his godfather as a mafia boss by imitating his actions and behavior.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Nardong Toothpick
programme.desc: Nardo was a simple student cum bank janitor who was accidentally accused of murder and robbery. The truth was, while he really intended to rob the victim, he had a change of heart.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)
programme.desc: Together, Robin and Vina, created beautiful music. Together they were in constant danger because of certain people and certain events, which were taking place around them, but they were not aware of.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.
